findings.title: Prefer explicit declaration of variable types
findings.description: It is recommended to explicitly define your variable types, this confirms your intent and safeguards against a future when the default type changes.

findings.title: Tokens should emit a generation event on creation
findings.description: When a token is first created it should log a `Transfer` event from address `0x0`. This is useful for tools such as EtherScan.io so they can see tokens have been minted.

findings.title: Using old compiler version
findings.description: This version of the solidity compiler is very old, you should use the most recent stable branch and ensure a consistent compiler between all contracts.
